meanings: There is not even a shadow
Not even a shadow is to be seen

vlive.korean: 그림! - 자! Geurim! - Ja! 듣기 View video LOVELYZ : '러블리즈 다이어리 시즌6' 6화 ('Lovelyz Diary Season 6' EP.6 )
들어왔다 근데 얼굴 그림자 장난 아닌데? It's on. But what's with the shade on the face? 듣기 View video TWICE : 아레나 투어 마지막 공연🎶👀
vlive.english: It's on. But what's with the shade on the face?

vlive.korean: 얼굴에 그림자 졌다고? There's a shadow on my face? 듣기 View video OH MY GIRL : YUB Night🌙
vlive.english: There's a shadow on my face?

vlive.korean: [그림자놀이] 이거 뭔데? [Shadow play] What is this? 듣기 View video TWICE : TWICE TV "Feel Special" EP.08
뒤에 누구냐고? 얘요? 이 그림자? Who is behind me? Him? This shadow? 듣기 View video VICTON : 여기로모여라~!🐥🐶
vlive.english: Who is behind me? Him? This shadow?

examples.korean: The shadows lengthened as the sun went down. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 해가 넘어가면서 그림자가 더 길어졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The shadows lengthened as the sun went down. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The trees threw long shadows across the lawn. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나무들이 잔디밭 위로 길게 그림자를 드리우고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The trees threw long shadows across the lawn. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The shadows lengthened with the approach of sunset. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 해질녘이 가까워지면서 그림자가 길어졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The shadows lengthened with the approach of sunset. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We peered into the shadows. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 그 그림자들을 유심히 보았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We peered into the shadows. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I haven’t seen hide nor hair of her for a month. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 한 달 동안 그녀의 그림자도 못 보았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I haven’t seen hide nor hair of her for a month. Add to Wordbook
